p: Column chromatography was carried out using a glass column (50 cm in length) packed with 120 g of silica gel (Sigma ®, St. Louis, MO, USA). The extract was eluted with a mixture of hexane-ethyl acetate-methanol 80:20:1 ( v/v). The collected fractions were analyzed by TLC to verify their successful separation and each fraction was concentrated with nitrogen (N 2) to 1 mL and stored at 5 °C.
